gw.api.system.server

Class Runlevel

  • gw.api.system.server.Runlevel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Runlevel
implements Serializable
    Simple class to express run level constants. This is implemented using the enum idiom with the caveat that it does nothing to address issues of serialization.

    The reason this class exists, as opposed to ints, is to prevent coding errors when crossing the SOAP boundary. Our SOAP calls, of necessity, require ints to specify run levels. These externally visible run levels need to be decoupled from our internal implementation for obvious reasons. This mechanism ensures that one does not inadvertently call into the InitTab with a mistaken run level.

    Note this class was developed after InitTab used ints for run levels.
